story.text: Jan 3 Car dealership United Auto Group Inc. (UAG.N) said Chief Financial Officer James Davidson retired and it named Robert O'Shaughnessy to the position, effective immediately. O'Shaughnessy has been with UnitedAuto since 1997, the company said in a statement. (Reporting by Rakesh Dubey in Bangalore)
story.title: united auto group says cfo retires , names replacement
